const.name: EPngInvalidCRCText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image is not valid because it contains invalid pieces of data (crc error)

const.name: EPNGInvalidIHDRText
const.value: The "Portable Network Graphics" image could not be loaded because one of its main piece of data (ihdr) might be corrupted

const.name: EPNGMissingMultipleIDATText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image is invalid because it has missing image parts.

const.name: EPNGZLIBErrorText
const.value: Could not decompress the image because it contains invalid compressed data. Description:

const.name: EPNGInvalidPaletteText
const.value: The "Portable Network Graphics" image contains an invalid palette.

const.name: EPNGInvalidFileHeaderText
const.value: The file being readed is not a valid "Portable Network Graphics" image because it contains an invalid header. This file may be corruped, try obtaining it again.

const.name: EPNGIHDRNotFirstText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image is not supported or it might be invalid. (IHDR chunk is not the first)

const.name: EPNGNotExistsText
const.value: The png file could not be loaded because it does not exists.

const.name: EPNGSizeExceedsText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image is not supported because either it's width or height exceeds the maximum size, which is 65535 pixels length.

const.name: EPNGUnknownPalEntryText
const.value: There is no such palette entry.

const.name: EPNGMissingPaletteText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" could not be loaded because it uses a color table which is missing.

const.name: EPNGUnknownCriticalChunkText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image contains an unknown critical part which could not be decoded.

const.name: EPNGUnknownCompressionText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image is encoded with an unknown compression scheme which could not be decoded.

const.name: EPNGUnknownInterlaceText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image uses an unknown interlace scheme which could not be decoded.

const.name: EPNGCannotAssignChunkText
const.value: The chunks must be compatible to be assigned.

const.name: EPNGUnexpectedEndText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image is invalid because the decoder found an unexpected end of the file.

const.name: EPNGNoImageDataText
const.value: This "Portable Network Graphics" image contains no data.

const.name: EPNGCannotChangeSizeText
const.value: The "Portable Network Graphics" image can not be resize by changing width and height properties. Try assigning the image from a bitmap.

const.name: EPNGCannotAddChunkText
const.value: The program tried to add a existent critical chunk to the current image which is not allowed.

const.name: EPNGCannotAddInvalidImageText
const.value: It's not allowed to add a new chunk because the current image is invalid.

const.name: EPNGCouldNotLoadResourceText
const.value: The png image could not be loaded from the resource ID.

const.name: EPNGOutMemoryText
const.value: Some operation could not be performed because the system is out of resources. Close some windows and try again.

const.name: EPNGCannotChangeTransparentText
const.value: Setting bit transparency color is not allowed for png images containing alpha value for each pixel (COLOR_RGBALPHA and COLOR_GRAYSCALEALPHA)

const.name: EPNGHeaderNotPresentText
const.value: This operation is not valid because the current image contains no valid header.
